ability.Dark Revival: When this Pokemon's HP is knocked out, for one chance, it can revive itself with 50% maximum HP.
ability.Shadow Swap: If this Pokemon uses a Dark-type move, it can restore 10% maximum HP.

Shadow Blast.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Dragon Rage.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

Nightmare Claw.effect: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Abyssal Roar.effect: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage.
